page.title: 15LEISURE IN CATERHAM
page.content:
In the valley is the{MILLER CENTRE which is the local theatre. The{ {LEISURE CENTRE}has mny activities like youth club, judo, ballet and dancing classes, roller skating and others. There are many parks in the valley including{TIMBERHILL PARK}which has a children's playground.
On the hill is{QUEENS PARK.}It has a bowling green, tennis courts, football and cricket pitches. It is well known for its water fountain which was presented in 1899 by F.A. White. Old people like to walk their dogs or just walk for pleasure because it is so peaceful. There are roundabouts, swings and all sorts of enjoyable things for children. There are many horse chestnut and oak trees in the park.
